1.「ふう。ようやく 着いたね。| ……さて 聖獣ダイキリンさまは| どこらへんに: Wind. We're finally here. ... Now, where do|you think the holy beast Daikirin is?

3.<if_woman>「いい？ <cs_pchero>ちゃん。| 聖獣ダイキリンさ: <if_woman>May I? <cs_pchero>. If you use dolma|spells, you'll be at a great disadvantage!<else>May I? <cs_pchero>. Use dolma spells|and you'll be at a great disadvantage!<endif>

4.<if_woman>「来たわっ！ お願いね！ <cs_pchero>ちゃん！|: <if_woman>Here they come! Please! <cs_pchero>!|Be merciless and take down the Daikirin!<else>Here they come! Please! <cs_pchero>!|Be merciless and take down the Daikirin!<endif>

5.「さあ 着いたわ。| 今度こそ 聖獣ダイキリンさまを倒して| あなたの強さを 示: Here we go. This time, I want you to show me|how strong you are by defeating the holy|beast Daikirin!

6.<if_woman>「いい？ <cs_pchero>ちゃん。| 聖獣ダイキリンさ: <if_woman>May I? <cs_pchero>. If you use dolma|spells, you'll be at a great disadvantage!<else>May I? <cs_pchero>. Use dolma spells|and you'll be at a great disadvantage!<endif>

7.<if_woman>「来たわっ！ お願いね！ <cs_pchero>ちゃん！|: <if_woman>Here they come! Please! <cs_pchero>!|Be merciless and take down the Daikirin!<else>Here they come! Please! <cs_pchero>!|Be merciless and take down the Daikirin!<endif>

8.「ふおーーーっ！ ふぉっふぉっふぉーっ！| 参ったーっ！ わしの負けじゃあーっ！: Wooooooo! Whoo-hoo-hoo! Oh, no! I've lost!

9.「いやはや お前さん 強いのう～。| 本気を出した わしに勝つとは| たいしたヤ: You're strong. You're quite a fellow to beat|me in a real fight.

10.「して こんな所へ わざわざ来るとは| わしに 聞きたいことでもあるんかあ？|: So, is there something you want to ask me,|coming all the way here? Hmm?

11.「は…はじめまして ダイキリンさまっ！| 私 賢者のアーニアといいまして……|: Ha... Nice to meet you, Mr. Daikirin! My|name is Arnia the Wise. I'm the one you want|to talk to!

12.「なぬ？ 用があるのは 嬢ちゃんのほうか。| ふ～む。お前さんみたいなのが いっ: What? I'm here for the little girl. . What|is it that someone like you wants to ask me?

13.「えーと…… 私 大賢者になりたくて| ダイキリンさまの お話を聞きたかったんで:
Well... I wanted to be a great sage, so I|wanted to listen to Daikirin-sama's story.|So you could tell me about old spells and|
|stuff like that...

14.「んん～っ！？ いやっ 待て 待て～！| 嬢ちゃんが 大賢者になる？| 確かに: Mmm~! No, no, wait, wait~! You're going to|be the wisest one in the world? Are you sure|that's what he said?

15.「え？ は…はい。| 大賢者になるのが 小さいころからの夢で| 幼なじみとも 約: Huh? Huh... I've dreamed of being a great|sage since I was a little girl, and I|promised my childhood friend...

17.「ぶおーっ！ ふぉふぉふぉふぉ！| ぶふぉふぉふぉふぉ！ こりゃ ケッサク！|: Boo-hoo! Whoo-hoo-hoo! Buh-buh-buh! Oh, my|God, Kessak! You are the wisest man alive!

19.「ぶはぁ～。いやあ すまん。すまんのう。| 嬢ちゃん いいかあ よ～く聞けよぉ？: Bu. Oh no . Sorry. Listen to me, young lady,|all right?

20.「お前さんには 心の闇が いっさい見えん！: I can't see any darkness in your heart!

21.「心を持つ者ならば 皆 大なり小なり| 闇を抱えて 生きるのが 道理じゃが……|:
It's reasonable to assume that everyone with|a heart lives with a little darkness in|their life, whether it's big or small. But|
|for some reason, you don't seem to have it.

22.「宇宙の理。その深遠に横たわるのが 闇じゃ。| その闇を知らずに 賢者として|: U. Lying in its depths . To think that you|can make it as a wise man without knowing|the darkness... is absurd.

23.<if_woman>「そこの 娘っ子なら ともかく| 嬢ちゃんは 天地が ひっく:
I don't care if it's your daughter over|there, she's not going to turn into a sage|even if heaven and earth were turned upside|
|down.I don't care if it's Bowes over there, the|little girl wouldn't be a sage even if|heaven and earth were turned upside down.

24.「……これ以上 話すのは 無駄なようじゃのう。| それでは わしは 失礼させても: ... It's useless to talk about this. Now, if|you'll excuse me.

25.「そんな……。私は 大賢者になれない……？| シェリルも このことを知っていて|: Oh, no. I can't be the Great Sage...? Did|Cheryl know about this and told you to give|it up?

26.「私 夢を かなえるために| 今まで がんばってきたのに……。| こんな……こん: I've worked so hard to make my dreams come|true. And now... This can't be happening.

27.<if_woman>「<cs_pchero>ちゃん…… ごめん。| 私 どうして: <if_woman> <cs_pchero> chan... . I don't know what|to do. Let's just go back to the Royal|Academy, okay?<else> <cs_pchero> -kun... . I don't know what|to do. Let's just go back to the Royal|Academy, okay?<endif>

28.「きっと シェリルも| このことを 知ってたんだね……。| だから 井戸で会った: I'm sure Cheryl knew about this. That's why|she said what she did when we met at the|well.

29.「アーニア。お前に 手紙が届いたぞ。: A. I got a letter for you.

31.「シェリルから手紙？ なんだろう……？| 読んでみますね。: Letter from Cheryl? What's that...? Read it.

32.「……親愛なる友 アーニア。| この間は ひどいことを言って すまなかった。|: ... My dear friend A. I'm sorry I was such a|jerk the other day. I couldn't help myself|if I didn't.

33.「アーニア……。今から ３年ほど前| 賢者になる試験の直前に お前が かかった|: ARNIA. I remember that terrible illness you|had about three years ago, right before your|test to become a sage.

34.「あれは 病気などではない……。| 賢者を志す者の心の闇に取り憑く| 呪いだった: It was not a disease. It was a curse that|haunts the darkest hearts of those who|aspire to be wise...!

35.「あのまま放っておけば 呪いのチカラにより| お前の心は 完全に闇に支配されただ: If you had left it as it was, the power of|the curse would have completely taken over|your heart.

36.「ひとたび そうなってしまえば| 心を乗っとられ 二度と| 自分の心を 取り戻す: Once that happens, it takes over your mind|and you can never get it back.

37.「……私は お前を救いたい 一心で| お前の中に眠る 心の闇を 奪いとり| その: ... I took the darkness that lies inside of|you and assumed its curse in order to save|you.

38.「その時点で お前と私の 夢は断たれた……。| お前は 大賢者に必要な闇のチカラ:
At that point, your dream and mine were cut|off. You lost the dark power necessary to|become the Great Sage, and I was doomed to|
|destruction by the curse.

39.「……これが 真実だ。| お前に これだけは 伝えたかった。: ... This is ... I told you this.

40.「私は 呪いもろとも この世を去る。| ……だが アーニア。お前だけは 生きてく: I'm not a curse on this world. ... But ah...|Only you will live. That's my last wish.

41.「シェリル……。そんな…そんな………！| あのコが おかしくなってしまったのは|: Cheryl. Oh, no... Oh, no...! It's all my|fault that she went crazy.

42.「私の 呪われた心の闇を| 奪ったために……。: For taking the darkness from my cursed|heart.

43.「……ダメ。このまま シェリルを| 放っておくことなんて できない。: ... I can't just leave Cheryl like this.

44.「大賢者になんて なれなくていい！| 私は 絶対に シェリルを救う方法を| 見つ: You don't have to be the Great Sage! I will|find a way to save Cheryl.

45.<if_woman>「ねえ <pc>ちゃん。| しばらくしたら また 私に| チ: <if_woman>Hey, <pc>.<else>Hey, <pc>... you think you could|help me again in a little while?<endif>

46.<if_woman>「私 死に物狂いで がんばるから！| 準備ができたら 賢者に: <if_woman>I'll do my very best! I'll do my very best!|When you're ready, be a wise man and come.|Please, <pc>!<else>I'll do my very best! I'll do my very best!|When you're ready, be a wise man and come.|Please, <pc>!<endif>
